original: @ga   @#/_/rje btshun ku ru ku le la bstod pa/
analyzed: @ga   @#/_/rje btshun ku ru ku le la bstod pa/
translated: Praise to the Noble Kurukullā🔽Homage to the feet of the guru jewel,🔽and to the feet of the supreme deity.

original: @ga   /  @@##/_/ta re na mo/_rje btshun rin chen bla ma rnams dang /_/lhag
analyzed: @ga   /  @@##/_/ta re na mo/_rje btshun rin chen bla ma rnams dang /_/lhag
translated: I praise a little with pleasing words

original: pa'i lha'i zhabs pad btud de/_/'khor ba las sgrol rig byed lha mo/_/snyan
analyzed: pa'i lha'i zhabs pad btud de/_/'khor ba las sgrol rig byed lha mo/_/snyan
translated: the knowledge goddess who liberates from saṃsāra.

original: pa'i tshhig gis cung zad bstod do/_/rgyal ba kun gyi sor rtog ye shes/_/'gro
analyzed: pa'i tshhig gis cung zad bstod do/_/rgyal ba kun gyi sor rtog ye shes/_/'gro
translated: The discriminating wisdom of all the victors,

original: dman gdul phyir lha mo'i tshhul ston/_/bsgrub pa po la rab tu brtshe ma/_/yum
analyzed: dman gdul phyir lha mo'i tshhul ston/_/bsgrub pa po la rab tu brtshe ma/_/yum
translated: in order to tame inferior beings, appears in the form of a goddess,🔽and is very kind to the practitioner.🔽I respectfully bow to you, supreme mother.🔽Free from the fault of flaws, in the center of a red lotus,

original: mchog khyod la gus pas 'dud do/_/nyes pa'i skyon bral pad+ma dmar dang /_/ bdag med mtshhon phyir ro yi snying khar/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal tshha zer dbus
analyzed: mchog khyod la gus pas 'dud do/_/nyes pa'i skyon bral pad+ma dmar dang /_/ bdag med mtshhon phyir ro yi snying khar/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal tshha zer dbus
translated: in the center of the light rays of natural luminosity,🔽you sit in the center of a sun in the heart of a corpse.

original: bzhugs/_/yum mchog 'gre/_'gro kun thugs rjes dbang du bsdud mdzad/_/
analyzed: bzhugs/_/yum mchog 'gre/_'gro kun thugs rjes dbang du bsdud mdzad/_/
translated: You, supreme mother, gather all beings under your compassion.🔽You are red in color, radiating a thousand light rays,

original: sku mdog dmar mo 'od zer stong 'phro/_/bcu drug lo lon sgeg pa'i nyams can//
analyzed: sku mdog dmar mo 'od zer stong 'phro/_/bcu drug lo lon sgeg pa'i nyams can//
translated: with the experience of sixteen-year-old beauty.

original: yum/_dngos kun rang bzhin stong pa nyid du/_/gcig phyir zhal gcig
analyzed: yum/_dngos kun rang bzhin stong pa nyid du/_/gcig phyir zhal gcig
translated: since all things are one in emptiness, you have one face.

original: dmar ba'i ljags 'dril/_/bdud dpung skrag mdzad mche ba rab gtshigs/_/
analyzed: dmar ba'i ljags 'dril/_/bdud dpung skrag mdzad mche ba rab gtshigs/_/
translated: Your red tongue is rolled up, and your fangs are bared, terrifying the hordes of demons.

original: yum/_dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum g.yo bas/_/dus gsum shes bya
analyzed: yum/_dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum g.yo bas/_/dus gsum shes bya
translated: Your three eyes, red and round, are darting, and you know the three times.

original: chags rtogs mi mnga'/_/spangs rtogs kun rdzogs dbu skra gyen rdzes/_/yum/
analyzed: chags rtogs mi mnga'/_/spangs rtogs kun rdzogs dbu skra gyen rdzes/_/yum/
translated: You have no attachment or concepts, and your hair is tied up on top, complete with all abandonments and realizations.

original: ye shes lnga ldan thod skam dbu rgyan/_/a sogs ka sogs gsung gi ngo bo/_/🔽brgya phyed thod rlon do shal 'chang ma/_/yum/_thabs shes rang bzhin rtsha ba'i🔽phyag gnyis/_/_ud pa la'i mda' gzhu bsnams nas/_/mtha' gnyis
analyzed: ye shes lnga ldan thod skam dbu rgyan/_/a sogs ka sogs gsung gi ngo bo/_/ brgya phyed thod rlon do shal 'chang ma/_/yum/_thabs shes rang bzhin rtsha ba'i phyag gnyis/_/_ud pa la'i mda' gzhu bsnams nas/_/mtha' gnyis
translated: You have a crown of dry skulls, which has the five wisdoms, and a garland of fifty fresh heads, which are the essence of speech.🔽You have two hands, the nature of method and wisdom,🔽holding a bow and arrow of utpala flowers,

original: 'dzin pa'i mtshhan rtogs 'bigs ma/_/yum/_lcags kyus 'gro rnams thar
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i mtshhan rtogs 'bigs ma/_/yum/_lcags kyus 'gro rnams thar
translated: piercing the concepts of grasping at the two extremes.🔽You beckon beings with a hook to the city of liberation,

original: pa'i grong 'gugs/_/thugs rje chen po'i zhags pas 'ching mdzad/_/tshhad
analyzed: pa'i grong 'gugs/_/thugs rje chen po'i zhags pas 'ching mdzad/_/tshhad
translated: binding them with the lasso of great compassion,🔽and you have four hands, which have the four fearlessnesses.

original: med bzhi ldan phyag bzhi mnga' ba'i/_/yum/_rigs kyi bdag po'i cod
analyzed: med bzhi ldan phyag bzhi mnga' ba'i/_/yum/_rigs kyi bdag po'i cod
translated: You have the topknot of the lord of the family,

original: pan 'chang zhing /_/bde ba che la rtag tu rol pas/_/shin tu rgyas pa'i nu
analyzed: pan 'chang zhing /_/bde ba che la rtag tu rol pas/_/shin tu rgyas pa'i nu
translated: manifestation of the great increase of the🔽wisdom of the mother.

original: 'bur dang ldan/_/yum/_shes rab ngo bo lha mo'i sku ni/_/thabs kyi rang
analyzed: 'bur dang ldan/_/yum/_shes rab ngo bo lha mo'i sku ni/_/thabs kyi rang
translated: The form of the goddess, the essence of wisdom,

original: bzhin phyag rgya lngas brgyan/_/gzung 'dzin spangs pa stag lpags bsnabs ma/_/
analyzed: bzhin phyag rgya lngas brgyan/_/gzung 'dzin spangs pa stag lpags bsnabs ma/_/
translated: Is adorned with the five symbolic ornaments, the nature of skillful means,🔽And wears a tiger skin to abandon the duality of subject and object.

original: yum/_shin tu zab pas khro chags skur ston/_/mi gnas myang 'das mngon
analyzed: yum/_shin tu zab pas khro chags skur ston/_/mi gnas myang 'das mngon
translated: You display the form of wrathful passion because of being extremely profound,

original: du mdzad phyir/_skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs ma/_/yum/_khyod
analyzed: du mdzad phyir/_skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs ma/_/yum/_khyod
translated: And you sit in half-crossed posture to actualize the nonabiding nirvana.🔽By the power of your speech, the recitation of the awareness mantra,

original: gsung rig sngags bzlas pa'i mthu yis/_/ma rig snying gi mun pa sangs nas/_/
analyzed: gsung rig sngags bzlas pa'i mthu yis/_/ma rig snying gi mun pa sangs nas/_/
translated: The darkness of ignorance in the heart is cleared away,🔽And the great wisdom kaya, in which the light of infinite qualities

original: mtha' yas yon tan snang ba rgyas pa'i/_/ye shes sku chen thob par mdzod cig_/
analyzed: mtha' yas yon tan snang ba rgyas pa'i/_/ye shes sku chen thob par mdzod cig_/
translated: shines forth, is attained.🔽The knowledge, love, and power of the victorious ones,

original: rgyal ba sras bcas nyan rang rnams kyi/_/mkhyen dang brtshe ba nus pa'i mthu
analyzed: rgyal ba sras bcas nyan rang rnams kyi/_/mkhyen dang brtshe ba nus pa'i mthu
translated: bodhisattvas, shravakas, and pratyekabuddhas🔽Are spontaneously present in an instant,

original: rnams/_/skad cig gcig la lhun grub nyid du/_/bdag gi dbang du gyur
analyzed: rnams/_/skad cig gcig la lhun grub nyid du/_/bdag gi dbang du gyur
translated: And come under my control.

original: par mdzod cig_/brgya byin tshhangs pa rgyal po bzhi sogs/_/stobs ldan
analyzed: par mdzod cig_/brgya byin tshhangs pa rgyal po bzhi sogs/_/stobs ldan
translated: May the power and strength of Indra, Brahma, the four kings, and so forth,

original: rnams kyi tshhe dang bsod nams/_/dpal 'byor yon tan nus pa'i mthu rnams/_/
analyzed: rnams kyi tshhe dang bsod nams/_/dpal 'byor yon tan nus pa'i mthu rnams/_/
translated: their life force, merit, glory, wealth, qualities, and abilities,🔽all be brought under your power.

original: khyed kyi mthu yis dbang du mdzod cig_/'gro rnams bdag gi dbang du gyur🔽nas/_/mi mthun phyogs rnams rab tu bcom ste/_/rnyed par dka' ba rdo rje
analyzed: khyed kyi mthu yis dbang du mdzod cig_/'gro rnams bdag gi dbang du gyur nas/_/mi mthun phyogs rnams rab tu bcom ste/_/rnyed par dka' ba rdo rje
translated: May all beings come under my power,🔽may all unfavorable conditions be completely destroyed,🔽and may they become vessels for the profound ripening and liberating🔽of the Vajrayana, so difficult to find.

original: theg pa'i/_/smin grol zab mo'i snod du mdzod cig_/lha mchog bsgrub la
analyzed: theg pa'i/_/smin grol zab mo'i snod du mdzod cig_/lha mchog bsgrub la
translated: May the supreme deity,

original: rje btshun ku ru ku le la bstod pa
analyzed: rje btshun ku ru ku le la bstod pa
translated: the lord Kurukulla,🔽crush all outer and inner harms,🔽such as sickness, spirits, untimely death, and so forth,

original: bar du gcod pa'i/_/nad dang gdon dang dus min 'chi sogs/_/phyi dang nang gi nye bar 'tshhe kun/_/mthu chen lha mos gzhoms par mdzod cig_/tshhe
analyzed: bar du gcod pa'i/_/nad dang gdon dang dus min 'chi sogs/_/phyi dang nang gi nye bar 'tshhe kun/_/mthu chen lha mos gzhoms par mdzod cig_/tshhe
translated: with her great power.🔽By always seeing your face

original: rab kun tu khyod zhal lta zhing /_/gsang sngags zab mo bzlas la brtshon pas/_/
analyzed: rab kun tu khyod zhal lta zhing /_/gsang sngags zab mo bzlas la brtshon pas/_/
translated: and being devoted to reciting the profound mantra,🔽may you seize me with the hook of your compassion

original: khyod kyi brtshe bas lcags kyus bzung nas/_/'dod pa'i re ba rdzogs par mdzod
analyzed: khyod kyi brtshe bas lcags kyus bzung nas/_/'dod pa'i re ba rdzogs par mdzod
translated: and fulfill all my wishes.

original: cig_/khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtshho che las/_/blo dman bdag gis cung zad
analyzed: cig_/khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtshho che las/_/blo dman bdag gis cung zad
translated: From the great ocean of your qualities, I, of little intelligence, have drunk🔽a little,🔽

original: brjod cing /_/phrin la bskul la 'bad pa byas pa'i/_/dge ba gang des🔽mar gyur 'gro rnams/_/ye shes lnga'i tog gis rab mdzes/_/mi 'gyur chos
analyzed: brjod cing /_/phrin la bskul la 'bad pa byas pa'i/_/dge ba gang des mar gyur 'gro rnams/_/ye shes lnga'i tog gis rab mdzes/_/mi 'gyur chos
translated: By this virtue, may all beings who have been my mothers🔽attain the fivefold wisdom,

original: sku'i rgyal mtshhan thob ste/_/gzugs sku'i dpal gyi gdul bya rnams la/_/phan
analyzed: sku'i rgyal mtshhan thob ste/_/gzugs sku'i dpal gyi gdul bya rnams la/_/phan
translated: the beautiful victory banner of the unchanging dharmakaya,

original: bde bzang po bsgrub par gyur cig_/gang zhig dang bas bstod pa 'di dag_/
analyzed: bde bzang po bsgrub par gyur cig_/gang zhig dang bas bstod pa 'di dag_/
translated: and may they accomplish the excellent benefit and happiness🔽of those to be tamed by the splendor of the rupakaya.🔽If one recites even once this praise🔽of Tara, the Heroine,

original: lan cig tsham yang brjod par byed na/_/sgrol ma dpa' mos rjes su bzung nas//
analyzed: lan cig tsham yang brjod par byed na/_/sgrol ma dpa' mos rjes su bzung nas//
translated: she will accept one as her disciple,🔽and one will become the lord of the three realms.

original: khams gsum kun la bdag po nyid 'gyur/_/rje btshun ma ku ru ku le la bstod🔽pa phrin las nye bar bskul ba zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dz+nya nas mdzad pa rdzogs
analyzed: khams gsum kun la bdag po nyid 'gyur/_/rje btshun ma ku ru ku le la bstod pa phrin las nye bar bskul ba zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dz+nya nas mdzad pa rdzogs
translated: The praise of the noble Kurukulla,🔽called “The Invocation of Activity,”

original: so/_/  ba ba tun _/tshho bya_nga _du chub khag po ka ka
analyzed: so/_/  ba ba tun _/tshho bya_nga _du chub khag po ka ka
translated: composed by the great scholar Jnanashri, is complete.🔽The five wisdoms are the five kayas.
